display_long_description:
You didn’t just buy a headset. You bought the keys to a **200-TON FLYING MECH**. 

Fight for glory in the Mecha League - the ultimate VR combat sport. Built for the Meta Quest, **MECHA** delivers **EXPLOSIVE ARENA BATTLES** with **HIGH-SPEED AERIAL COMBAT**, and a full career mode with sponsors, tournaments, upgrades, and rival pilots.

Rise through the ranks, customize your mecha, and carve your name into the league with every thunderous win.  

# BECOME THE ULTIMATE PILOT

Master the **lean movement** system, using your body to strafe, dash, and weave through fire. Combat demands both **precision aim** and **smart defense**: line up your shots, then raise your arm to deploy a shield that blocks incoming fire. 

When the moment strikes, trigger the **Gigaform** to triple your size and dominate the arena as a towering titan. 

# DOMINATE THE LEAGUE

Climb the ladder from Rookie to All-Star by winning **tournaments**. Enemies you dominate evolve into **top rivals** with massive cash bounties on their heads. Impress corporate sponsors by **completing high-stakes missions** that can yield massive payouts. 

# YOUR MECH, YOUR RULES 

- **6 Game Modes:** Dominate in Deathmatch, outlast the competition in Survival, hunt the giant in Juggernaut, or squad up and take the win in team modes. 
- **Visual Customization:** Personalize your mech with custom paint schemes and adjustable neon emissive glows. 
- **Mod System:** Fine-tune your loadout with an upgrade system where every mod offers strategic trade-offs.
